entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 a.m. CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 early this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
